title: A basic Tic Tac Toe game on C++ CUI. This game is designed to be simple and easy to use for 2 player. You can play again and again until when you want.
A basic Rock Paper Scissors game on Python. You can play against the computer. You can choose your move with A S and D keys and play again and again until you want.
A simple text to binary and binary to text converter. You can convert any text to binary and binary to text easily with this tool.
A basic Python calculator with a simple GUI. You can perform basic arithmetic operations and see the results instantly.
A Valorant agent instalocker bot that automatically selects your preferred agent when the game starts. With this bot, you can choose what agent you want to play in game at pre-game.
This website is my personal portfolio and built with ReactJs. It showcases my projects and skills.
